aries.name: Aries
aries.description: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, representing new beginnings, pioneering spirit, and the spark of creation. As a Cardinal Fire sign ruled by Mars, Aries embodies courage, initiative, and the drive to lead. Aries natives are natural trailblazers who thrive on challenge and competition.
aries.mysticalProperties: Courage, enthusiasm, and initiative; rules beginnings and ventures with leadership qualities.
aries.loveTrait: Aries loves passionately and directly. They pursue what they want with characteristic boldness, preferring partners who can match their energy and independence.
aries.careerTrait: Aries excels in leadership roles, entrepreneurship, and careers requiring initiative. They thrive in competitive environments and pioneering fields.
aries.affirmation: I courageously lead with passion and embrace new beginnings.

taurus.name: Taurus
taurus.description: Taurus is the stabilizer of the zodiac, bringing patience, determination, and a love of beauty and comfort. As a Fixed Earth sign ruled by Venus, Taurus values security, sensual pleasures, and the finer things in life. Taurus natives build lasting foundations through steady, persistent effort.
taurus.mysticalProperties: Reliability, practicality, and determination; influences matters of finance, comfort, and physical pleasures.
taurus.loveTrait: Taurus loves deeply and loyally, seeking partners who offer security and sensual connection. They express love through physical affection and creating comfortable environments.
taurus.careerTrait: Taurus excels in finance, arts, culinary fields, and any career requiring patience and attention to quality. They build lasting success through steady effort.
taurus.affirmation: I build lasting abundance through patience and devotion.

gemini.name: Gemini
gemini.description: Gemini is the communicator of the zodiac, bringing intellectual curiosity, adaptability, and social charm. As a Mutable Air sign ruled by Mercury, Gemini represents the mind's ability to process and share information. Gemini natives are versatile, expressive, and endlessly curious.
gemini.mysticalProperties: Communication, intellectual curiosity, and versatility; embodies dual nature and adaptability.
gemini.loveTrait: Gemini loves through mental connection and variety. They need partners who stimulate their minds and can keep up with their ever-changing interests.
gemini.careerTrait: Gemini excels in media, writing, teaching, sales, and any field requiring communication and adaptability. They thrive on variety and intellectual challenge.
gemini.affirmation: I embrace curiosity and express myself with clarity and wit.

cancer.name: Cancer
cancer.description: Cancer is the nurturer of the zodiac, bringing emotional depth, intuition, and protective care. As a Cardinal Water sign ruled by the Moon, Cancer represents the realm of feelings, home, and family. Cancer natives create safe havens and form deep emotional bonds.
cancer.mysticalProperties: Emotion, nurturing, and intuition; rules home and family with caring and protective traits.
cancer.loveTrait: Cancer loves deeply and protectively, seeking partners who value home and emotional security. They express love through nurturing and creating comfortable spaces.
cancer.careerTrait: Cancer excels in caregiving, hospitality, real estate, and creative fields. They bring emotional intelligence and protective instincts to their work.
cancer.affirmation: I nurture with love and trust my intuitive wisdom.

leo.name: Leo
leo.description: Leo is the performer of the zodiac, bringing creativity, confidence, and generous warmth. As a Fixed Fire sign ruled by the Sun, Leo represents self-expression, leadership, and the joy of being alive. Leo natives shine brightly and inspire others with their radiant energy.
leo.mysticalProperties: Self-confidence, creativity, and drama; leadership, pride, and theatrical energy.
leo.loveTrait: Leo loves grandly and loyally, seeking partners who appreciate their warmth and can share the spotlight. They express love through grand gestures and devoted attention.
leo.careerTrait: Leo excels in entertainment, leadership, creative arts, and any role that allows them to shine. They naturally inspire and motivate others.
leo.affirmation: I shine my light confidently and inspire others with joy.

virgo.name: Virgo
virgo.description: Virgo is the analyst of the zodiac, bringing precision, helpfulness, and dedication to improvement. As a Mutable Earth sign ruled by Mercury, Virgo represents the practical application of intelligence. Virgo natives serve others through careful attention to detail and continuous refinement.
virgo.mysticalProperties: Practicality, analytical abilities, and attention to detail; associated with service, meticulousness, and modesty.
virgo.loveTrait: Virgo loves through service and practical care. They seek partners who appreciate their thoughtfulness and share their values of improvement and health.
virgo.careerTrait: Virgo excels in healthcare, editing, analysis, research, and any field requiring precision. They bring meticulous care and practical solutions.
virgo.affirmation: I serve with excellence and embrace healthy self-improvement.

libra.name: Libra
libra.description: Libra is the harmonizer of the zodiac, bringing balance, beauty, and a gift for partnership. As a Cardinal Air sign ruled by Venus, Libra represents the pursuit of fairness, aesthetics, and relationship. Libra natives create beauty and balance wherever they go.
libra.mysticalProperties: Balance, harmony, and partnerships; focused on justice, diplomacy, and relationships.
libra.loveTrait: Libra loves through partnership and harmony. They seek relationships of equality and beauty, expressing love through romantic gestures and attentive partnership.
libra.careerTrait: Libra excels in law, diplomacy, arts, design, and any field requiring balance and beauty. They bring fairness and aesthetic sensibility.
libra.affirmation: I create harmony and beauty in all my relationships.

scorpio.name: Scorpio
scorpio.description: Scorpio is the transformer of the zodiac, bringing intensity, depth, and the power of regeneration. As a Fixed Water sign ruled by Pluto, Scorpio represents the hidden depths, psychological insight, and the cycle of death and rebirth. Scorpio natives probe beneath surfaces to discover truth.
scorpio.mysticalProperties: Transformation, mystery, and intensity; influences themes of sexuality, death, and rebirth.
scorpio.loveTrait: Scorpio loves with total intensity and devotion. They seek deep, transformative connections and express love through passionate loyalty and emotional depth.
scorpio.careerTrait: Scorpio excels in psychology, investigation, healing, and any field requiring depth and strategy. They bring transformative power to their work.
scorpio.affirmation: I embrace transformation and the power of emotional depth.

sagittarius.name: Sagittarius
sagittarius.description: Sagittarius is the explorer of the zodiac, bringing optimism, adventure, and a quest for meaning. As a Mutable Fire sign ruled by Jupiter, Sagittarius represents expansion, higher learning, and the search for truth. Sagittarius natives seek wisdom through experience and adventure.
sagittarius.mysticalProperties: Exploration, freedom, and philosophy; represents optimism, love for freedom, and adventurous spirit.
sagittarius.loveTrait: Sagittarius loves with freedom and adventure. They seek partners who share their love of exploration and can give them space to grow.
sagittarius.careerTrait: Sagittarius excels in travel, education, publishing, and philosophy. They bring optimism and expansive vision to their work.
sagittarius.affirmation: I explore life with optimism and seek truth in all things.

capricorn.name: Capricorn
capricorn.description: Capricorn is the achiever of the zodiac, bringing discipline, ambition, and the determination to reach the top. As a Cardinal Earth sign ruled by Saturn, Capricorn represents mastery, structure, and the patient climb to success. Capricorn natives build lasting legacies through persistent effort.
capricorn.mysticalProperties: Discipline, structure, and ambition; rules career, determination, and careful planning.
capricorn.loveTrait: Capricorn loves with loyalty and long-term commitment. They seek partners who share their values of stability and are willing to build together.
capricorn.careerTrait: Capricorn excels in management, government, finance, and any field requiring discipline. They naturally climb to positions of authority.
capricorn.affirmation: I achieve my goals through discipline and patient determination.

aquarius.name: Aquarius
aquarius.description: Aquarius is the visionary of the zodiac, bringing innovation, individuality, and humanitarian ideals. As a Fixed Air sign ruled by Uranus, Aquarius represents progress, revolution, and the advancement of humanity. Aquarius natives see beyond convention to imagine better futures.
aquarius.mysticalProperties: Innovation, individuality, and humanitarianism; focuses on unconventional thinking, community, and idealism.
aquarius.loveTrait: Aquarius loves through friendship and intellectual connection. They seek partners who respect their independence and share their progressive ideals.
aquarius.careerTrait: Aquarius excels in technology, science, social causes, and innovation. They bring revolutionary thinking and humanitarian vision.
aquarius.affirmation: I embrace my uniqueness and work for the good of humanity.

pisces.name: Pisces
pisces.description: Pisces is the mystic of the zodiac, bringing compassion, creativity, and spiritual depth. As a Mutable Water sign ruled by Neptune, Pisces represents the dissolution of boundaries, artistic inspiration, and connection to the divine. Pisces natives feel deeply and create beauty from their inner visions.
pisces.mysticalProperties: Empathy, compassion, and intuition; associated with mysticism, spirituality, and sensitivity.
pisces.loveTrait: Pisces loves with unconditional compassion and romantic idealism. They seek soulmate connections and express love through artistic gestures and emotional attunement.
pisces.careerTrait: Pisces excels in arts, healing, spirituality, and creative fields. They bring imagination and compassion to their work.
pisces.affirmation: I flow with compassion and trust my intuitive creativity.
